trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies that a data field value is a well-formed phone number using a regular expression for phone numbers.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxx xxxxx xxxxx xx x xxxx$xxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx x xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Determines whether the specified phone number is in a valid phone number format.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xx x xxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: true if the phone number is valid; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x
